listitem.para: Open the Users app and click User.
In the object list, click the relevant user and select Edit.
While changing password few considerations must be kept in mind. Entered password will be validated based on certain rules.
Password should contain at least one special character. Which is any character other then alphabets and digit numbers.
Password should contain at least one upper case and one digit number.
Password should not contain user's username or email address.
Password should not contain generic words for example system, admin, user, login, manager etc.
Password should not be one of the previous 24 passwords
Password should contain more than minimum number of characters ( this is congurable ) and it should not contain more than 40 characters
In case a super user is reseting password for some other user than 5th rule does not apply.
